name: Super Chicken Factory
description:
Controls:

A,W,D for player 1

<,^,> for player 2

* Collect crates or Jump on your opponent to win

* Avoid Trap

* Chickens freeze you

* Jump on chickens to kill them

* On sudden death, grab a crate to win

all made by me with Unity, theGimp and Blender3d

Author : NICOLAS Ralph
